channel.title: [Delta] HUGE PROBLEM! No drops on pvp WTF?[Delta]
channel.description:
[b]Hello. [/b]
I'm using GarboScape, which is DeltaScape but with a few features.
Anyways, me and my friend were messing around we thougth we'd try a deathmatch against eachother. This is when I noticed that when you die, you get to keep all your items and when you kill somsone you get no loot.
This has to be fixed. I've added a whole lot of non-pvp content that I would not like to download a new souce and start over agian. I've searched the forums for tips on how to do this and I've tried to add like a "addItem(....." (this is what I found in my itemhandler to add items to the ground) But I couldn't get it together without bugs.
Pleaes help me. This must be fixed or else my whole server is screwed :(

item.title: [Delta] HUGE PROBLEM! No drops on pvp WTF?[Delta]
item.dc:creator: @Praktikanten Praktikanten
item.description:
@Praktikanten wrote:

[quote=“david7147, post:4, topic:349274”][quote author=Praktikanten link=topic=445648.msg3271527#msg3271527 date=1279236304]

Dude , get a new source or if your going to have to edit allot of things…

If I get a new one I might have to re-do a whole lot more… I’ve added custom npc’s, custom items, custom quests, custom minigames, a custom skill, changed what you create with creation skills and such…

There has to be some way to fix this? Or at least, maybe just drop random pvp related loot? I don’t know…
[/quote]
Does this happen with all players? On most sources, Owners keep everything when they die.[/quote]

Oh … Right… I was owner and he was admin… I’ll try with two normal accounts

EDIT:

Oh haha That was the problem, tried killing a normal player and drop system worked perfect (with skulling = 0 item and non skulling = 3)
Thank you so much for pointing that out

Read full topic
item.source: [Delta] HUGE PROBLEM! No drops on pvp WTF?[Delta]

If I get a new one I might have to re-do a whole lot more… I’ve added custom npc’s, custom items, custom quests, custom minigames, a custom skill, changed what you create with creation skills and such…

There has to be some way to fix this? Or at least, maybe just drop random pvp related loot? I don’t know…[/quote]
Does this happen with all players? On most sources, Owners keep everything when they die.
